大概玩了四个小时，就通关了。
新奇的玩法真的不虚此行。
在最后的Still Alive响起来的瞬间，你就会觉得这个游戏真的值得。
后续的奖励关卡难度增加，很适合我这种动脑子的人（自夸
但是，游戏旅途中还是能感觉到粗糙之地，比如加载游戏和地图连接的设计让人游戏节奏不够流畅，但是也瑕不掩瑜。
总之，它是至少有八分的佳作，有那个曾为你喝彩之人，真的很好。

Este juego lo tenía desde hace tiempo y no había tenido oportunidad de jugarlo, sabía que era un juego bastante bueno pero nunca me informé nada de él, a simple vista es un juego de puzzles con portales y ya pero durante el juego te vas dando cuenta de que no, durante la primera mitad del juego (la primera hora o la primera hora y media) van habiendo comentarios que te quedas medio desubicado pero todo lo demás es bastante soft, después de la segunda mitad es cuando le empiezas a dar sentido a todo y todo empieza a darle ese tono oscuro o un poco más diferente de lo que había sido al juego.
La parte final es la mejor parte del juego, bastante divertida y con bastante tensión, los puzzles no son tan difíciles pero te podrías estancar en alguno.
Recomendado 100% para usuarios que les gustaron juegos como "We Were Here" o juegos de puzzles algo parecidos, ¡bastante diferente la historia a lo que me esperaba!

The "Test Chambers" commentary and credit roll are superb. In case you're rubbing your eyes, I indeed said the credits are off the chain. With all this talk of cake and missiles, I feel like a certain someone might have been in the idea room. If you know, you know.

Portal hopping and combat both come in linear and non-linear forms, but both are fun. Aside from the grand finale (I won't go into details), the combat really comes second to the portals. Not only is it a trip to see yourself entering a portal from the view of the portal you're about to exit from, the stability of jumping between parts of the room is just oh so marvelous.

Sound design is good. Nothing extraordinary, but satisfactory.

[b]围绕一种有趣的机制，层层推进地设计一系列精彩的关卡[/b]。走在老大哥《半条命2》（Half Life 2）的后面，《传送门》（Portal）看起来画面不算绚丽、剧情不够宏大、物理引擎已不惊艳、交互稀少、场面太小、流程过短。但它却因着这么一套核心，拥有比肩前者的超高评价。

把握游戏“玩“的本质，不那么高大全的《传送门》，在《半条命2》玩起来令人感叹英雄垂垂老矣的今天，依然是如此的精彩有趣。在它面前，重力枪真的也就那么回事儿。

从游戏开始，把握节奏定期引入新的机制或玩法思路，步步推进，然后献上一段兼具综合性与新意的复杂关卡，最后是一场有趣的BOSS战。伴随着通关动画格外好听的《Still Alive》，三四个小时的流程紧凑而回味无穷。

长度配合目前的点子数量基本上刚刚好。如果为了增加内容量而重复使用类似的过关思路，游戏的精致程度则会大大下降。尽管直到通关，以简洁的空间穿越到达远处目标依然让人觉得如此新奇而炫酷。

场景狭小单一是一大遗憾。好在这款游戏还有更上一层楼的续作。

这是橙盒里最好玩的游戏，感谢V社。

I only finally got a chance to play this game after years of hearing about it, and it really lives up to the hype. The plotline gets more and more interesting as it goes, the puzzles are engaging and challenging, and the song at the end is great. If this hasn't already been recommended to you a dozen times, here I am, recommending it again.

Шедевр без преувеличения! Затягивает сразу и неожиданно. Геймдизайн выверен идеально, рекомендую однозначно даже если вы считаете, что головоломки это не ваше, головоломки здесь приемлемой головоломности. Берет игра простой идеей с порталами, которую обставили потрясающим образом. Простейшая идея с двумя порталами как ни странно работает и тебе просто каждую минуту интересно в это играть. Такая простая механика работает на базовом уровне - это раз (и это поражает), а два это то, что геймдизайнеры вокруг этого ядра геймплея (с порталами) собрали отличную игру!

This is the greatest puzzle game of All Time. The story and game-play mechanics are beyond its time and I was pleasantly surprised to see how active the community is despite the fact that it is 13 years old.

At the time of Portal's release, Valve was known for innovative gameplay that forced you to think outside the box by utilizing the objects around you rather than just shooting enemies to proceed. Portal pushes that formula to an extreme, removing the enemies entirely in favor of physics and momentum based puzzles. It serves as soft-prequel to the Half-Life series taking place in the facility of Black Mesa's biggest competitor, Aperture Science. Where Black Mesa failed at their teleportation experiments, Aperture seems to have perfected it, localizing their portal tech to the size of a handheld gun. The portal gun is an absolute blast to play with, and Valve seems to know this since they built a game centered around the mechanic. Though short, the campaign is tight from start to finish. There's some well written humor here and you'll love the antagonist, GlaDOS. It's an instant classic and exemplifies Valve when they were at their peak.
